body:
love lies (loki x reader)

a/n: i honestly feel like this is straight from the middle of a full fic like i should write this shit from the start, if you like it pls pls tell me whether to make a full story out of it. this is for @saphrin, im so sorry for how long it took me to get up off my ass and write your request and thankyou so much for all the support over the past week, it means so much to me!!!

————

♡ tell me where your love lies

waste the day and spend the night

underneath the sunrise

show me where your love lies ♡

you don’t know why loki took such an interest in you. you weren’t sure what it was that really drew him to you. you weren’t royal, you weren’t rich and you didn’t have any important connections. you were just a commoner who lived in the small village at the bottom of the palace.

loki told you he loved you, and you returned those three words, however only one thing stopped your relationship from progressing further; his arranged marriage.

you knew loki didn’t want to be married to the girl, you knew that if he could go against his father he would call off the marriage in order to be with you. but the both of you knew better than to go against the allfather.

loki had to spend the day in the palace with his fiancé, but when night fell, he snuck out of the palace to see you. you two often met in the woods, on the cliff that overlooked the sea and the rest of the galaxy.

however, loki’s visits had slowly become less frequent. whether he would be there or not was pot luck, yet you still went to your meeting place each night, sometimes knowing that loki wouldn’t be there, but still taking your chances.

and that was where you were heading now, to your meeting place. a part of you felt hopeful, hopeful that your lover would be there and waiting for you.

you sighed to yourself as you stepped over broken branches and crunching leaves in the wooded area. you so desperately wanted to confront loki about his absence. you wanted to tell him that you wouldn’t take this anymore, that you weren’t going to be the girl on the side, or the ‘mistress’. you wanted him to be yours and only yours. you were just looking for the right time to say it.

when you arrived at the cliff, you were surprised to see the familiar sight of raven hair and green and black clothing. you smiled to yourself and approached him slowly, “loki….”

loki turned to you, a small smile on his lips, “y/n, my love. i’ve missed you.”

you looked down at the ground, “it’s been over a week since we’ve seen each other loki…”

he nodded, “i know my love, and i’m so sorry about that. things have been getting so difficult in the palace, what with my engagement and all. i’ve been forced to attend meetings, public appearances and parties all week. i simply haven’t had the time to come out here and see you every night.”

you nodded, and just decided to keep quiet about your feelings for the time being. hearing about the time he’s spent with his fiancé and not you over the past week hurt. you weren’t sure how to respond to it.

loki sighed to himself, “y/n. come on. i can tell you’re upset. tell me what’s wrong.”

biting your lip, you decided if he was asking, you would tell. “i…i’ve waited here for you every single night. even when you didn’t show up at the usual time i still waited, hoping you would. this is all getting too much for me loki. i love you, i really do. but you’re getting married soon. i don’t want to be pushed to the side.”

the way he looked at you brought tears to your eyes. he looked hurt, wounded by your words. but every word you spoke was the truth. after a few seconds, he opened his arms, inviting you in for a hug, and you accepted the offer.

he wrapped his arms around you tightly, and pressed a kiss on your forehead. you closed your eyes, trying to enjoy the hug, but you couldn’t shake off the feeling that it all just felt so wrong to you. you didn’t belong in his arms.

suddenly, you pulled away from the hug, “i’m sorry loki, i have to go. it’s best if you don’t come here anymore.”

you turned your back to loki and started walking away, but you were surprised when you felt his hand grab your wrist. “y/n, you’re not going anywhere. i want to keep seeing you, you’re the most beautiful person i’ve ever met. you’re so kind and funny and i want to keep you in my life.”

“then show me. show me that your love lies with me and not her. i can’t do this anymore unless you prove to me your love lies with me. i’m not being the mistress in your marriage.”

loki nodded, “of course, i’ll call off the engagement tomorrow morning and tell my father i’m in love with you.”

you bit your lip and nodded slowly, wrapping your arms around loki, “thankyou.”

you had no idea what you were getting yourself into

when you arrived at the cliff, you were surprised to see the familiar sight of raven hair and green and black clothing. you smiled to yourself and approached him slowly, “loki….”

you looked down at the ground, “it’s been over a week since we’ve seen each other loki…”

he nodded, “i know my love, and i’m so sorry about that. things have been getting so difficult in the palace, what with my engagement and all. i’ve been forced to attend meetings, public appearances and parties all week. i simply haven’t had the time to come out here and see you every night.”

suddenly, you pulled away from the hug, “i’m sorry loki, i have to go. it’s best if you don’t come here anymore.”

“then show me. show me that your love lies with me and not her. i can’t do this anymore unless you prove to me your love lies with me. i’m not being the mistress in your marriage.”

loki nodded, “of course, i’ll call off the engagement tomorrow morning and tell my father i’m in love with you.”

you bit your lip and nodded slowly, wrapping your arms around loki, “thankyou.”

you had no idea what you were getting yourself into

title: The House in the Field
body:
Steve is looking for Bucky, HYDRA is looking for Bucky, but is somebody else?

What’s The Plan, Cap?

Ava made her way slowly up to the room she had left Bucky and Ida in, stopping by the kitchen to clean the blood up from her hand and to gather her thoughts. It scared her at just how quickly the…

Read more…

summary: Tony can’t fucking stand it when Steve gets hurt, because while the serum heals him fast, it also makes it pretty impossible to...
body: Tony can’t fucking stand it when Steve gets hurt, because while the serum heals him fast, it also makes it pretty impossible to use any sort of pain killers or sedatives on him. So Steve just has to lay there and suffer pain made even worse by the accelerated healing, and Tony can’t do a damn thing about it. There’s no bot, no code no anything he cam make or do. There’s nothing he can do but sit there with him and hold his hand.

So Steve just has to lay there and suffer pain made even worse by the accelerated healing, and Tony can’t do a damn thing about it. There’s no bot, no code no anything he cam make or do. There’s nothing he can do but sit there with him and hold his hand.

blog.name: juliabohemian
blog.title: Loki is potato
blog.description:
Educator who is committed to the continued research of the
effects of all forms of early childhood trauma on the socioemotional
development of elementary school students, and who sometimes applies that research to fictional characters. Secular humanist and unapologetic logician.

summary: So I have an avengers 4 theory and I'm going to post it so when/if it happens I can show it to people and be like I knew  it.So...
body: So I have an avengers 4 theory and I’m going to post it so when/if it happens I can show it to people and be like I knew it.So I think Peter Quill’s celestial powers are being reactivated or they were never gone? idk.I think this because first of all when he is turning into dust his eyes turn red and no one else’s eyes did that.That has to mean something.And in the movie he mentions he is half human I feel like they wanted to point out he was half celestial.And like shouldn’t the powers just permanently be in his dna idk.It makes sense in my head

blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them.
